title: IS415-GAA
text:
Welcome to IS415 Geospatial Analytics and Applications.
This is the course website of IS415 I study this term. You will find my course work on this website.

title: In-class Exercise 2: Geospatial Data Wrangling
text:
Install the required packages.

install.packages('pacman')

Load the packages.

pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse, funModeling)

Read the file from geoBoundaries.


Show the code
geoNGA = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/", layer="geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM0")%>%st_transform(crs=26392)


Read the file from Humanitarian Data Exchange.


Show the code
nga = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/", layer="nga_admbnda_adm1_osgof_20190417")%>%st_transform(crs=26392)
